resources.name: Advanced Technology
resources.text:
During the Activation Phase, any ship in your fleet may:

1) Disable one of its [tech] Upgrades to use an Action from its Action Bar as a free Action.

OR

2) Discard one of its already disabled [tech] Upgrades to use an Action from its Action Bar as a free Action.

A ship cannot perform any other free Actions on the round that it uses either of these abilities.
